video.title: Castlevania
video.synopsis: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly beasts controlled by Dracula himself. Inspired by the classic video games.

episodes.synopsis: A headstrong young woman seeks out forbidden knowledge, and a corrupt bishop courts disaster by enraging a legend.
episodes.title: Witchbottle

episodes.synopsis: Trevor Belmont drifts into the panicked city of Gresit, where he learns of an ancient evil and makes a surprising vow.
episodes.title: Necropolis

episodes.synopsis: Belmont explores the catacombs of Gresit and makes a disturbing discovery. As night falls on the city, the beasts return for blood.
episodes.title: Labyrinth

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Belmont strives to save Gresit from certain doom and comes face to face with a shocking truth.
episodes.title: Monument

episodes.synopsis: Dracula entrusts a deadly -- and personal -- mission with two humans who truly hate humanity, not knowing that he himself has become a target.
episodes.title: War Council

episodes.synopsis: As Belmont shares a bold strategy with Alucard and Sypha, Dracula addresses a conflict within his ranks. Isaac recalls a painful encounter.
episodes.title: Old Homes

episodes.synopsis: Belmont travels to his family's archives, along with Sypha and a cynical Alucard. Godbrand voices a suspicion about Dracula's motives.
episodes.title: Shadow Battles

episodes.synopsis: As Godbrand's thirst grows stronger, Carmilla tries to recruit Hector. Isaac shows his loyalty, and Belmont shares a family story with Sypha.
episodes.title: Broken Mast

episodes.synopsis: Carmilla presses forward with her plan despite Godbrand's disappearance. Sypha makes a startling discovery while combing the archives.
episodes.title: Last Spell

episodes.synopsis: Does he really have what it takes to live up to his family’s reputation? It's time for Belmont to pick his fate. Also, Dracula prepares for the fight.
episodes.title: The River

episodes.synopsis: With nothing less than the future of humanity at stake, Belmont, Alucard and Sypha do battle with their immortal enemy: Dracula.
episodes.title: For Love

episodes.synopsis: With the war between humans and vampires seemingly settled, the survivors -- both good and evil -- look toward the future.
episodes.title: End Times

episodes.synopsis: Alucard adjusts to his lonely new life, Belmont and Sypha pay a visit to an eerie and unusual town, and Carmilla returns home with a prize.
episodes.title: Bless Your Dead Little Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Isaac gets some unexpected help in his search for Hector. Meanwhile, Carmilla plots a land grab and Alucard meets some fans.
episodes.title: The Reparation of My Heart

episodes.synopsis: Belmont and Sypha's plan to leave Lindenfeld hits a snag. Isaac and the Captain debate the merits of humanity. Hector tries to get a read on Lenore.
episodes.title: Investigators

episodes.synopsis: Sumi and Taka share their history with Alucard. Also, Saint Germain gains entrance to the priory, and Isaac receives an icy welcome in Genoa.
episodes.title: I Have a Scheme

episodes.synopsis: Belmont and the Judge discover an ominous symbol, Saint Germain's treasure hunt is cut short, and Alucard's bond with Sumi and Taka continues to grow.
episodes.title: A Seat of Civilisation and Refinement

episodes.synopsis: Lenore continues to spend time with Hector, slowly earning his trust. Saint Germain experiences a telling nightmare about the Infinite Corridor.
episodes.title: The Good Dream

episodes.synopsis: As Saint Germain makes unsettling discoveries, Isaac marches toward a showdown. Meanwhile, Belmont and Sypha question a monk — aggressively.
episodes.title: Worse Things Than Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Something is alive in the priory's basement, and for Belmont and Sypha, time is of the essence. Lenore opens up to Hector about Carmilla’s plans.
episodes.title: What the Night Brings

episodes.synopsis: Night falls on Lindenfeld and all manner of hell breaks loose. Also, Isaac meets the Magician, Hector makes a pledge, and Sumi and Taka make a move.
episodes.title: The Harvest

episodes.synopsis: With the portal to hell open, Trevor and Sypha must battle an onslaught. Meanwhile, the Judge shares a disturbing legacy, and Hector learns his fate.
episodes.title: Abandon All Hope

episodes.synopsis: Belmont and Sypha continue to battle beasts loyal to Dracula, but it's getting a little old. Meanwhile, Alucard receives a guest.
episodes.title: Murder Wakes It Up

episodes.synopsis: Lenore urges Hector to not test Carmilla's patience. Belmont and Sypha cross paths with Zamfir, a fearsome guard with a suspicious mind.
episodes.title: Having the World

episodes.synopsis: Isaac gets under Varney's skin. Vampires Morana and Striga receive an urgent message from Carmilla. Belmont and Sypha get a look at Targoviste.
episodes.title: Walk Away

episodes.synopsis: Alucard travels to Danesti, where he makes a dramatic entrance in the nick of time. Also, the scholar Saint Germain reflects on his own twisted path.
episodes.title: You Must Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: With Greta's help, Alucard sets out to guide the villagers to his castle for protection. Sypha pushes back on Zamfir's leadership. Isaac makes a move.
episodes.title: Back in the World

episodes.synopsis: As Isaac and his army of night creatures descend on Carmilla's castle, Hector rushes to finish his preparations before the bloody reunion begins.
episodes.title: You Don't Deserve My Blood

episodes.synopsis: Varney and Ratko discover their plan is working — but who gets the credit? Also, Zamfir finally takes Belmont and Sypha underground.
episodes.title: The Great Work

episodes.synopsis: Belmont, Sypha and Zamfir battle Varney, Ratko and their unholy army. Alucard's castle falls under attack, and Saint Germain shares his scheme.
episodes.title: Death Magic

episodes.synopsis: Belmont and Sypha join forces with their old friend Alucard — and not a moment too soon. As the battle rages, Varney reveals his true form.
episodes.title: The Endings

episodes.synopsis: Not content to live in a cage, Lenore chooses another fate. Alucard opens his castle. Sypha wonders if she's lost Belmont for good.
episodes.title: It's Been a Strange Ride
